verses.verse: Oh <S%H3212>come,<s%> <S%H7442>let<s%>'s sing to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> <S%H7321>Let<s%>'s shout aloud to the <S%H6697>rock<s%> of our <S%H3468>salvation!<s%>
<S%H6923>Let<s%>'s come before his <S%H6440>presence<s%> with <S%H8426>thanksgiving.<s%> <S%H7321>Let<s%>'s extol him with <S%H2158>songs!<s%>
For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> is a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H410>God,<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> above all <S%H410>gods.<s%>
In his <S%H3027>hand<s%> are the deep <S%H4278>places<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> The <S%H8443>heights<s%> of the mountains are also <S%H2022>his.<s%>
The <S%H3220>sea<s%> is <S%H6213>his,<s%> and he made <S%H3027>it.<s%> His hands <S%H3335>formed<s%> the dry <S%H3006>land.<s%>
Oh <S%H935>come,<s%> <S%H7812>let<s%>'s worship and bow <S%H3766>down.<s%> <S%H1288>Let<s%>'s kneel <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> our <S%H6213>Maker,<s%>

for he is our <S%H430>God.<s%> We are the <S%H5971>people<s%> of his <S%H4830>pasture,<s%> and the <S%H6629>sheep<s%> in his <S%H3027>care.<s%> <S%H3117>Today,<s%> oh that you would <S%H8085>hear<s%> his <S%H6963>voice!<s%>
<S%H7185>Don't<s%> harden your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> as at <S%H4808>Meribah,<s%> as in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H4531>Massah<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%>
when your <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H5254>tempted<s%> <S%H974>me,<s%> tested <S%H7200>me,<s%> and saw my <S%H6467>work.<s%>

<S%H705>Forty<s%> long <S%H8141>years<s%> I was <S%H6962>grieved<s%> with that <S%H1755>generation,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "It is a <S%H5971>people<s%> that <S%H8582>errs<s%> in their <S%H3824>heart.<s%> They have not <S%H3045>known<s%> my <S%H1870>ways.<s%>"
Therefore I <S%H7650>swore<s%> in my <S%H639>wrath,<s%> "They <S%H935>won't<s%> enter into my <S%H4496>rest.<s%>"
